Text: This is a great torrent, I was a longtime seeder, however I have quit seeding it because a DVD of the first season has just been released. It's very affordable, and any fan of this great and creepy series should buy it, as it's very indie and needs the support. You can get it at http://www.marblehornetsdvd.com/ the production is great, and it's worth every penny.
Thanks for the link, Kairu, that's definitely appreciated, and thanks for the support of this torrent before the DVD was released
